turns.content:
Treasury Management
For a more prosperous community and token.
Simply put the treasury and stated wallets will engage in calculated sells and buys to maintain steady growth. This includes selling to re-balance validator investments to generate consistent constant buybacks and buying back tokens for appreciation or burning to maintain a sustainable growth rate for the long term.

The treasury management system for #Endgame is designed to ensure the long-term stability and growth of the token. This is achieved by engaging in calculated sells and buys to maintain a steady growth rate. This includes re-balancing validator investments to generate consistent buybacks and buying back tokens for appreciation or burning to maintain a sustainable growth rate for the long term. This approach can help to ensure that the token remains valuable and attractive to investors over time, which can help to support the growth of the community and the token.

Please rewrite: Referral System
A lucrative opportunity for the determined!
#Endgame is implementing a 7-year referral system. Meaning you will receive rewards for any buys and sells your friend makes for the next 7 years and your friend will receive a discount for those 7 years as well.
If a person opts to not use the referral system they will pay the full price and taxes.
The referral system dapp can be found here: dapp.endgame.black.

The referral system in #Endgame is a great opportunity for those who are determined to earn rewards. By participating in the 7-year referral program, you will receive rewards for any purchases or sales made by your referred friends. Additionally, your referred friends will also receive a discount for 7 years. However, those who choose not to use the referral system will be charged the full price and taxes. The referral system dapp can be accessed at dapp.endgame.black.

Airdrop Raffles
Airdrops are fun!
To keep the project fresh for newcomers we will offer airdrops from time to time for certain activities in Endgame or Reward tokens.

To create excitement and engagement for new community members, #Endgame will occasionally hold airdrop raffles for certain activities or milestones within the project. These airdrops will include reward tokens as prizes, which can be used to buy and sell on the platform. This helps to keep the project active and engaging for new users, and also helps to distribute tokens to a wider audience. Keep an eye out for announcements of upcoming airdrop raffles, and participate in the community to have a chance to win!

Tax System Breakdown
The numbers speak to me.

The tax system breakdown for #Endgame is designed to be fair and transparent for all users. The system includes a flat fee for all transactions, as well as a percentage-based fee for larger transactions. The flat fee is used to cover the costs of network fees and other expenses, while the percentage-based fee is used to fund the treasury and ensure sustainable growth for the project. Additionally, the tax system may include a referral fee for users who choose to participate in the referral system, which rewards users for bringing new members to the community. Overall, the tax system is designed to balance the needs of the community and the project, ensuring that everyone benefits from the success of #Endgame.

Sell 20% - Minus 10% for the use of the referral system 
⁃ 3% goes to Reward token reflection - Minus 1% if referred 
⁃ 14% goes to Liquidity, RFV, Treasury, #Endgame Champion
Algorithmic Chart Management System, and Burning System - Minus 8% if referred
⁃ 2% to Battle Royal Champion System - Minus 1% if referred
⁃ 1% to rebaser wallet

It appears that the referral system in this tax system breakdown offers a significant reduction in taxes for those who use it. The referral system also appears to benefit multiple different areas of the Endgame project, such as liquidity, RFV, and the Battle Royal Champion System. Additionally, a percentage of the tax is allocated to the reward token reflection, algorithmic chart management system, and the burning system. Finally, a small percentage is allocated to the rebaser wallet.

Sell 20% - Minus 10% for the use of the referral system 
⁃ 3% goes to Reward token reflection - Minus 1% if referred 
⁃ 14% goes to Liquidity, RFV, Treasury, #Endgame Champion
Algorithmic Chart Management System, and Burning System - Minus 8% if referred
⁃ 2% to Battle Royal Champion System - Minus 1% if referred
⁃ 1% to rebaser wallet

This breakdown appears to outline the percentage of fees that are taken from a sell transaction on the #Endgame platform, with the referral system providing a discount on these fees. The percentages allocated to various uses such as liquidity, RFV, and the Battle Royal Champion System, as well as a small percentage going to a "rebaser wallet." It is not entirely clear what the specific use case of these different systems are, but they seem to be a way of allocating the fees collected from sell transactions to different aspects of the platform.

Please rewrite: Sell 20% - Minus 10% for the use of the referral system 
⁃ 3% goes to Reward token reflection - Minus 1% if referred 
⁃ 14% goes to Liquidity, RFV, Treasury, #Endgame Champion
Algorithmic Chart Management System, and Burning System - Minus 8% if referred
⁃ 2% to Battle Royal Champion System - Minus 1% if referred
⁃ 1% to rebaser wallet

"When a token is sold, 20% of the proceeds will go towards various systems and programs within the Endgame ecosystem. If a referral code is used, an additional 10% discount will be applied. 3% will be allocated towards the Reward token reflection program, with an additional 1% discount if referred. 14% will go towards liquidity, RFV, Treasury, #Endgame Champion, Algorithmic Chart Management System, and Burning System, with an additional 8% discount if referred. 2% will be allocated towards the Battle Royal Champion System, with an additional 1% discount if referred. Lastly, 1% will go towards the rebaser wallet."

Sell 20% - Minus 10% for the use of the referral system 
⁃ 3% goes to Reward token reflection - Minus 1% if referred 
⁃ 14% goes to Liquidity, RFV, Treasury, #Endgame Champion
Algorithmic Chart Management System, and Burning System - Minus 8% if referred
⁃ 2% to Battle Royal Champion System - Minus 1% if referred
⁃ 1% to rebaser wallet

When a user sells tokens on the #Endgame platform, 20% of the sale will go towards various systems and initiatives. If the user has used a referral link, they will receive a 10% discount on this percentage.

3% of the sale will go towards the Reward token reflection system, with an additional 1% discount if the user was referred.
14% of the sale will go towards liquidity, RFV, the treasury, the #Endgame Champion system, the Algorithmic Chart Management System, and the Burning System. If the user was referred, they will receive an additional 8% discount on this percentage.
2% of the sale will go towards the Battle Royal Champion System, with an additional 1% discount if the user was referred.
1% of the sale will go towards the rebaser wallet.
Dynamic Whale Tax ⁃ %1 to %10 goes to purchasing reward tokens.
Dynamic Whale Tax: a percentage (ranging from 1% to 10%) of the transaction will be allocated towards purchasing reward tokens.
Dynamic Whale Tax ⁃ %1 to %10 goes to purchasing reward tokens.

The Dynamic Whale Tax system is designed to incentivize larger transactions while also helping to support the overall health of the Endgame ecosystem. Under this system, a percentage of the transaction value (ranging from 1% to 10%) will be used to purchase reward tokens, which can be used to access various features and benefits within the platform. This system is intended to both encourage larger transactions while also helping to support the liquidity and stability of the ecosystem.

Approaching Zero
The goal post is set at zero taxes!
#Endgame ultimately wants to reach as close as possible to a zero tax structure but #Endgame, in the beginning, must have some funds to build the infrastructure towards that eventual end.
Decisions about changing taxes will be made over time together with the community.

Our aim is to gradually decrease taxes as the platform and community grow, ultimately reaching a state where taxes are minimal or non-existent. This will be achieved through careful planning and collaboration with the community. As the infrastructure and network of #Endgame develop, we will continuously assess the tax structure and make adjustments as necessary to strive towards a zero tax system.
